cookie.title: We Use Cookies
cookie.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By accepting cookies, you allow us to use this information.
cookie.settingsDescription: Choose which cookies you want to accept. Necessary cookies are always active to ensure the site functions properly.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver ads and content relevant to you.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Allow the website to remember your choices and provide enhanced features.
